수술 과정 (Operative procedure)
Standard open
1. Under the general endotracheal anesthesia, the patient was placed at the surgical table by supine position
with hyperextended neck.
2. The operative field was prepared and draped as usual sterile manner.
3. Low transverse curvilinear skin incision was made along the natural skin crease.
4. Subcutaneous tissue was divided and platysma muscle was opened.
5. The strap muscle was divided at the mid line and areolar tissue was dissected.
6. Surgery for thyroid (yes )
Thyroid surgery was performed. ( Lt., isthmus)
The anterior and lateral side of the thyroid gland was exposed. The thyroid gland was pushed toward medially.
Perithyroidal fascia was dissected while searching the parathyroid glands and recurrent laryngeal nerve.
Superior and inferior thyroid vessels were divided and ligated while preserving of parathyroid glands and
recurrent laryngeal nerve.
The thyroid gland was mobilized from the trachea, and the thyroid lobe was divided at the isthmus.
The specimen was removed out. A precise check of the surgical field was performed, and all bleeding focus
was controlled.
7. Surgery for neck node ( yes )
Lymph node dissection was performed according to the anatomical neck compartments.
CCND: Lt.
8.3.2Fr JP drainage was indwelled into the dead space( no )
9. The strap muscle was repaired, then the platysma muscle was approximated.

수술 과정 (Operative procedure)
Standard open
1. Under the general endotracheal anesthesia, the patient was placed at the surgical table by supine position
with hyperextended neck.
2. The operative field was prepared and draped as usual sterile manner.
3. Low transverse curvilinear skin incision was made along the natural skin crease.
4. Subcutaneous tissue was divided and platysma muscle was opened.
5. The strap muscle was divided at the mid line and areolar tissue was dissected.
6. Surgery for thyroid (yes )
Thyroid surgery was performed. ( Lt., isthmus)
The anterior and lateral side of the thyroid gland was exposed. The thyroid gland was pushed toward medially.
Perithyroidal fascia was dissected while searching the parathyroid glands and recurrent laryngeal nerve.
Superior and inferior thyroid vessels were divided and ligated while preserving of parathyroid glands and
recurrent laryngeal nerve.
The thyroid gland was mobilized from the trachea, and the thyroid lobe was divided at the isthmus.
The specimen was removed out. A precise check of the surgical field was performed, and all bleeding focus
was controlled.
7. Surgery for neck node ( yes )
Lymph node dissection was performed according to the anatomical neck compartments.
CCND: Lt.
8.3.2Fr JP drainage was indwelled into the dead space( no )
9. The strap muscle was repaired, then the platysma muscle was approximated.

수술 과정 (Operative procedure)
Standard open
1. Under the general endotracheal anesthesia, the patient was placed at the surgical table by supine position
with hyperextended neck.
2. The operative field was prepared and draped as usual sterile manner.
3. Low transverse curvilinear skin incision was made along the natural skin crease.
4. Subcutaneous tissue was divided and platysma muscle was opened.
5. The strap muscle was divided at the mid line and areolar tissue was dissected.
6. Surgery for thyroid (yes )
Thyroid surgery was performed. ( Lt., isthmus)
The anterior and lateral side of the thyroid gland was exposed. The thyroid gland was pushed toward medially.
Perithyroidal fascia was dissected while searching the parathyroid glands and recurrent laryngeal nerve.
Superior and inferior thyroid vessels were divided and ligated while preserving of parathyroid glands and
recurrent laryngeal nerve.
The thyroid gland was mobilized from the trachea, and the thyroid lobe was divided at the isthmus.
The specimen was removed out. A precise check of the surgical field was performed, and all bleeding focus
was controlled.
7. Surgery for neck node ( yes )
Lymph node dissection was performed according to the anatomical neck compartments.
CCND: Lt.
8.3.2Fr JP drainage was indwelled into the dead space( no )
9. The strap muscle was repaired, then the platysma muscle was approximated.
